story.hline: Chahal mastery keeps South Africa in check
story.intro: The leggie finished with figures that read: 4 overs, 11 dots, 20 runs, 3 wickets as South Africa crumbled in chase
story.seoHeadline: India Yuzvendra Chahal mastery keeps South Africa in check

coverImage.caption: Yuzvendra Chahal returned figures of 3 for 20

story.hline: South Africa learn that India don't go quietly
story.intro: India had lost five of their six completed T20Is against South Africa at home before registering their biggest win over the Proteas on Tuesday
story.seoHeadline: South Africa learn that India don't go quietly

coverImage.caption: India won the third T20I by 48 runs, their biggest victory against South Africa in terms of runs

story.hline: Injured Rahul doubtful for Edgbaston Test
story.intro: The India opener, who had to be withdrawn from the T20I series against South Africa because of a groin strain, is not certain for the Edgbaston Test

story.hline: Hard to hit: How Test specialists are turning over a new leaf in T20 bowling

story.hline: India fall for traps on a tough batting night
story.intro: South African bowlers maximised the friendly conditions, catching India short on batting application and a crucial few runs
story.seoHeadline: South Africa tour of India, 2022: India fall for traps on a tough batting night

coverImage.caption: "If there's anything we could've done [better], it would've been to spend a little more time up the order to gauge how the wicket is playing," Shreyas said.

story.hline: India recover, but then comes Klaasen
story.intro: Despite Bhuvneshwar Kumar's powerplay heroics with the ball, Klaasen maneuvered South Africa's chase on a tricky pitch with a 46-ball 81
story.seoHeadline: India recover, but then comes Klaasen

coverImage.caption: Klaasen put South Africa's chase back on track after Bhuvneshwar's powerplay three-fer.

story.hline: Klaasen 81 powers South Africa to 2-0 lead
story.intro: Bhuvneshwar Kumar's 4-13 in vain as India fall to seventh straight defeat (across formats) against South Africa
